component.name: usbrelay
component.summary: USB-connected electrical relay control, based on hidapi

description.p: A small utility to control USB HID based relays that can be used for home automation or other switching needs. The devices are available from several sources and are able to handle up to 10A 250VAC.
An example application are USB controllable power switches. You may use such a switch to control the power supply of an external hard disk drive for backup purposes.
